title: Gooseneck Hitch Install: CURT 60612 with 60645 on 2015 Ford F-350
description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 60645 Double Lock Gooseneck Install Kit and the CURT 60612 Under-bed Double Lock EZr Gooseneck hitch on a 2015 Ford F-350 short-bed. 

Install Sheet:
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/60612/installsheet/CM_60612_INS.PDF
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/60645/installsheet/CM_60645_INS.PDF

Application Coverage:
2011-2016 F-250 & F-350 Super Duty Ford 

Special Notes:
***DO NOT EXCEED VEHICLE MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDED TOWING CAPACITY***
Do not install mounting rails over plastic bed liners. Plastic bed liners must be cut out of the way to provide metal to metal contact. Base rails may be installed on spray in liners.

Only use provided hardware.
Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.
-Need help or have some questions? Call Technical Support at 800.798.0813 (Monday-Friday 8am-7pm CST)
tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, trailer hitch, towing, how to install, Gooseneck Hitch, curt 60645, Ford F350, F-350
